A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is probably the best Star Wars film I've ever seen - and my surname comes from Rogue One so that's saying something! The first viewing I was constantly on the edge of my seat\, and the second viewing I just sat on the floor the whole time! I've never wanted to be part of a story more than I have with this. Thank you Rian Johnson\, for this wonderful creation!
